title: What is the use of a cell phone holder? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well if your talking about in a car, which has turned into a mobile phone both now, it's so you can keep both hands on the wheel and keep your peripheral vision clear from having something smacked against your head while trying to maneuver a 1500+ lbs vehicle through traffic and still be able to freely complain about the cares of the world. I myself have bluetooth and my phone and SUV pair automatically. Being a professionally trained driver and trainer however , I rarely take calls while driving as I consider them a distraction and for most common drivers dangerous! Now if your talking about on your belt, it's so you can free up your pocket…
